articles.description: Perhaps affordable is a bit of a stretch, but following the latest round of Amazon discounts, the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5G and Galaxy Z Fold 2 5G are less expensive than ever before.

articles.title: [Update: Studio reponse] Stadia port of Terraria canceled after co-creator locked out of Google accounts - 9to5Google
articles.description: The co-creator of Terraria has canceled the game's upcoming Stadia port after being locked out of his personal Google account.
articles.content: It’s unfortunately not a super uncommon issue for people to be randomly locked out of Google accounts, and in many cases the recovery process is full of a lot of frustrating waiting. That’s what happ… [+6373 chars]
